Package retrieval.storage.index

Package of index classes

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Entry
    This class implements an entry for a visual word B in the index of tests vector t Entry are [I - nbit] where iq is the ID of request image I and nbi is the number of times I produce B for t.
    Index
    This class is an abstract class for index This implements a hight level index, it means that you can add pictures, delete pictures, get similar pictures...
    IndexMultiThread
    This class is a class for multithreaded index This implements a hight level index, it means that you can add pictures, delete pictures, get similar pictures...
    IndexStructAbs
    Abstract class for index structure Two type of index structure: Kyoto/Redis/Memory/...: collection = index.get(key) than value=collection.get(subkey) Redis: index.get(key,subkey,value)
    IndexStructClassic
    A visual word index which is implemented by: -simple hashmap for MEMORY config -bdb for BDB config -voldemort for VOLDEMORT config -mysql for a MYSQL config
    PictureIndex
    Picture index (not visual word index!) Just store meta-data about indexed pictures: id, path and number of patchs.
    PicturesToPurge
    This class implement a set of pictures that has been deleted from server but that already exists on server index.
    ResultSim
    An association with picture path, picture thumb path and similarity between picture and request image.
    ValueStructure
    This class implements a value structure for the index A value structure is map with a visual word B and contains entry [I,NIBT] for each image I that generate NIBT (!=0) patchs which produced B

Package retrieval.storage.index Description
